CSSCounterStyleRule.summary: The CSSCounterStyleRule interface represents an @counter-style at-rule.

remarks.para:
-@counter-style
-CSS counter styles module
-Using CSS counters guide

CSSCounterStyleRulePad.summary: The pad property of the interface gets and sets the value of the {{cssxref("@counter-style/pad", "pad")}} descriptor. If the descriptor does not have a value set, this attribute returns an empty string.

CSSCounterStyleRuleFallback.summary: The fallback property of the interface gets and sets the value of the {{cssxref("@counter-style/fallback","fallback")}} descriptor. If the descriptor does not have a value set, this attribute returns an empty string.

CSSCounterStyleRuleSpeakAs.summary: The speakAs property of the interface gets and sets the value of the {{cssxref("@counter-style/speak-as","speak-as")}} descriptor. If the descriptor does not have a value set, this attribute returns an empty string.

CSSCounterStyleRuleAdditiveSymbols.summary: The additiveSymbols property of the interface gets and sets the value of the {{cssxref("@counter-style/additive-symbols","additive-symbols")}} descriptor. If the descriptor does not have a value set, this attribute returns an empty string.

CSSCounterStyleRuleSymbols.summary: The symbols property of the interface gets and sets the value of the {{cssxref("@counter-style/symbols","symbols")}} descriptor. If the descriptor does not have a value set, this attribute returns an empty string.

CSSCounterStyleRuleSuffix.summary: The suffix property of the interface gets and sets the value of the {{cssxref("@counter-style/suffix","suffix")}} descriptor. If the descriptor does not have a value set, this attribute returns an empty string.

CSSCounterStyleRulePrefix.summary: The prefix property of the interface gets and sets the value of the {{cssxref("@counter-style/prefix","prefix")}} descriptor. If the descriptor does not have a value set, this attribute returns an empty string.

CSSCounterStyleRuleRange.summary: The range property of the interface gets and sets the value of the {{cssxref("@counter-style/range","range")}} descriptor. If the descriptor does not have a value set, this attribute returns an empty string.

CSSCounterStyleRuleSystem.summary: The system property of the interface gets and sets the value of the {{cssxref("@counter-style/system", "system")}} descriptor. If the descriptor does not have a value set, this attribute returns an empty string.

CSSCounterStyleRuleNegative.summary: The negative property of the interface gets and sets the value of the {{cssxref("@counter-style/negative","negative")}} descriptor. If the descriptor does not have a value set, this attribute returns an empty string.

CSSCounterStyleRuleName.summary: The name property of the interface gets and sets the {{CSSxRef("<custom-ident>")}} defined as the name for the associated rule.
